name: thought-reminder
description: Electron MVP that shows periodic spiritual thoughts you must acknowledge.

scripts.build:assets: copyfiles -u 2 "src/ui/**/*" dist/ui && copyfiles -u 2 "src/content/thoughts.json" dist/content && copyfiles -u 2 "src/storage/*.json" dist/storage
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run build:assets
scripts.dev:electron: wait-on dist/main.js dist/ui/popup.html dist/content/thoughts.json dist/storage/config.json dist/storage/state.json && electron .
